items.sentence: This is by far the tallest building in this city.
This is probably the key that Tom is looking for.
This is the book Tom was talking about yesterday.
This is the color we want you to paint our fence.
I\'ll be giving Mary a bracelet for her birthday.
I\'m going to be much more careful in the future.
If you want to talk to Tom, you\'ll have to wait.
Tom can\'t see what\'s written on the blackboard.
You should be proud of what you\'ve accomplished.
That took much more time than I thought it would.
Tom reminded Mary to renew her driver\'s license.
Tom said he can\'t eat that much food by himself.
Tom wanted to eat cake and ice cream for dessert.
Tom wanted to grab a bite to eat on his way home.
Tom wanted to know what Mary was doing in Boston.
Tom wanted to know why it would take three hours.
There are more stars in the sky than I can count.
There is a free bus from the station to the mall.
There were only a few days left before Christmas.
Mr. Jackson gives us a lot of homework every day.
When are you going to pick Tom up at the airport?
Who do you think is the best French speaker here?
Why did you wait so long to tell anyone about it?
Would you like me to carry your suitcase for you?
Tom didn\'t tell Mary how much money he\'d spent.
Tom doubts that he\'ll be able get there on time.
Before Tom met Mary, he never seemed to be happy.
Can anyone vouch for your whereabouts last night?
I think that you should add a little more pepper.
I think you had better stick to your present job.
Tom says he thinks it\'s a waste of time to vote.
Tom says it\'s your turn to take out the garbage.
Tom says that he\'s fed up with this hot weather.
Tom says that he\'s not interested in doing that.
I feed my dog two cups of dog food every evening.
Tom often drank chocolate milk when he was a kid.
Tom only has one faded photograph of grandfather.
Tom opened the box and took out a beautiful ring.
Tom opened the freezer and got out the ice cream.
Tom opened the trunk and took out the spare tire.
I\'m glad that you found the money that you lost.
I\'m going to go out and get us something to eat.
I\'m not sure Tom would want me to give you that.
I\'ll have exams right after the summer holidays.
I\'m not satisfied with the quality of your work.
I\'ve already done everything Tom asked me to do.
What\'s the real reason you didn\'t go to Boston?
I thought you should know I\'ve been dating Mary.
I thought you told me you couldn\'t speak French.
I wonder if Tom will be at Mary\'s party tonight.
